Topic.Title: obama is a murderer and a liar and so is everyone who supports him.

Message.Msg: to a low IQ idiot like You, of course you would have no clue of what could become of you, however, you or your progeny could be traveling overseas and get a knife in the back for your American Accent. You could be at Ground Zero if we ever have another terror attack, which due to the MASS MURDERS of OBAMA seems inevitable! You could -if there is a GOD- suffer eternal damnation as a degenerate soul! There are too may ways in which your stupid AXX can get the Chair, YOU as a FOOL, are just too dumb to understand! YOU SUPPORT MURDER AND YOU BECOME MURDER!

Message.Title: Democrats stoop to new lows
Message.Msg: David Horowitz is steaming mad about Dems registering and coaching mentally ill patients to vote for Obama. His younger brother has the mental capacity of a 6 year old and resides in a state facility. He was taken to the polls by a Dem group and told Obama would save him. Another man also claimed the same thing happened to a relative who has lived most of his life in a home for the handicapped. There were a total of 60 patients that were coached and led to the polls.He added that his relative didn't know what a Pres was or what the vote meant. I guess they couldn't get enough dead people rounded up and it's almost certain this is how phyllis got to the polls to vote.

Message.Msg: You know, I've got no use for any kind of rat fink. I've never reported anyone for anything. When I was younger I had my own ways of evening the score. I still do but they are a little different. I've been "reported" a couple of times. I think it's funny.

Message.Title: Two Shot in Florida Walmart
Message.Msg: over a parking space. What are they putting in the water down there? Angry nuts on the loose. Even so, Florida's crime rate has risen in proportion to the transplanted jobless and homeless taking advantage of an elderly population. Home invasions are a trend in Fla. Good luck for buckwheat, I don't think they target house boats.
